generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to a building.
- building: A building with glass walls and scaffolding is visible on the right side of the street.
- fence: A metal fence with vertical bars is present along the sidewalk, separating it from the building.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk, likely for traffic lights or signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees line both sides of the road, providing shade and greenery.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible in the background, particularly on the left side of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing bright and clear.
- person: A person is walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked or driving on the road, visible in the background.
- truck: A white truck is visible in the background, parked or driving on the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
